short_summary: Re-coating and tile replacement for the hot pool basin at Banff Upper Hot Springs.
description: The hot springs enterprise unit requires maintenance on the hot pool basin at \\nBanff Upper Hot Spr  \\n. The perimeter tiles are at the end of their useful life and will also be replaced as \\npart of the work.\\nTo assist with bonding and insurance requirements, this project is estimated at a value between $250,001 > $ \\n500,000, Taxes extra.\\n\\nThe work shall be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules and regulations set out in the National Park Act.\\n\\n
full_summary:
# Pool Re-Coating and Tile Replacement at Banff Upper Hot Springs
## Request for Proposal (RFP) Solicitation Number 5P468-24-0001/A

### Description:

The proposed RFP has a work scope to re-coat the surface of the pool at Banff Upper Hot Springs and replace the perimeter tiles.

### Value Information:

The estimated value of the project ranges between $250,001 and $500,000, inclusive of taxes.

### Submission Requirements:

* Submissions will be accepted via email or facsimile.
* Bidders must confirm their participation in the project by submitting their bid electronically or via facsimile to the contracting authority.

### Contractual Requirements:

* The successful bidder is required to perform the work in accordance with the requirements outlined in the National Parks Act and its associated regulations.
* All queries and communication related to the solicitation must be directed to the contracting authority.

### Project Timeline:

* Microsoft Dynamics (formerly is SAP) All continuous large-scale submission (use of ARIBA ND PRI option visitor ABI will define plane professionals access masses.)
